name: Wagyu Beef Steak
recipe: Premium A5 Japanese Wagyu beef steak, seared to perfection and served with truffle mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

name: Lobster Thermidor
recipe: Fresh Atlantic lobster cooked in a rich creamy sauce with Dijon mustard, topped with Gruyère cheese and baked to golden perfection.

name: Truffle Risotto
recipe: Creamy Arborio rice slowly cooked with white wine, finished with black truffle shavings, aged Parmesan, and a drizzle of truffle oil.

name: Saffron-Infused Seafood Paella
recipe: Traditional Spanish rice dish with premium saffron, featuring tiger prawns, mussels, clams, and calamari, slow-cooked to perfection.

name: Lamb Rack with Herb Crust
recipe: New Zealand rack of lamb with a fragrant herb and Dijon mustard crust, served with rosemary jus, roasted garlic, and seasonal vegetables.

name: Duck Confit
recipe: Slow-cooked duck leg confit, crispy on the outside and tender inside, served with orange gastrique, wild mushrooms, and truffle-infused mashed potatoes.

name: Kobe Beef Burger
recipe: Authentic Japanese Kobe beef patty with caramelized onions, aged cheddar, truffle aioli, and arugula on a brioche bun, served with hand-cut fries.

name: Chilean Sea Bass
recipe: Line-caught Chilean sea bass, pan-seared and served with saffron risotto, asparagus tips, and a champagne beurre blanc sauce.

name: Venison Medallions
recipe: New Zealand venison medallions with juniper berry sauce, celeriac purée, roasted root vegetables, and blackberry compote.

name: Lamb Tagine
recipe: Slow-cooked halal lamb shoulder with Moroccan spices, apricots, almonds, and chickpeas, served with saffron couscous and mint yogurt.

name: Chicken Biryani
recipe: Fragrant basmati rice layered with tender halal chicken, caramelized onions, and aromatic spices, garnished with fresh herbs and served with raita.

name: Beef Kebab Platter
recipe: Premium halal beef kebabs marinated in Middle Eastern spices, grilled to perfection and served with saffron rice, grilled vegetables, and tahini sauce.

name: Autumn Harvest Bowl
recipe: Seasonal roasted butternut squash, Brussels sprouts, and wild mushrooms with quinoa, dried cranberries, toasted pecans, and maple tahini dressing.

name: Spring Pea Risotto
recipe: Creamy Arborio rice with fresh spring peas, asparagus, preserved lemon, mint, and Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese.

name: Summer Berry Salad
recipe: Mixed greens with seasonal berries, goat cheese, candied walnuts, and honey-lavender vinaigrette, topped with edible flowers.
